title: Am I an earth angel if all I do is help people and coincidences happen? - Quora

response.answer_text: As noble as it is to help others, you must be careful it's for the right reasons. few people are worth the help as well, as few really want to help themselves. The most important person to help is you. show others the way with your example, rather than helping them with your sacrifice. But as an earth angel ? You probably don't want to be one of those right now it's a bit of a mess ; ).
Well if you could sing — Earth Angel — while helping people…..God bless you. Don't be Afraid. Trust in God and Jesus Christ. For they are the way to the Truth and the Light.
Definitely, you're an ANGEL, we need people like you to have a peaceful world.  Please accept my best regards. @samadam24
